name: Soccer United: Real Score Star
description:
Manchester is a city full of history and one of the most developed and populated places in England. Several historic characters and events have forged the city as we know it today. But this is not the time to speak about history, this is the time to speak about something that drives crazy not only the locals but also people all around the world: Football! Start to history with the Manchester Devils football team thanks to this amazing game of goal shooting! Kick the ball, participate in the world cup and become a legend of football! What are you waiting for? Manchester Devils are waiting for you! Score your first goal!

Join the team and prepare yourself to be the best professional defender of this teamplay and beat the goalkeeper. Master the free kick and the penalty shooting to become a legend of the Manchester Devils! Live the thrills of the soccer and start playing the different game modes to be the top scorer of the Manchester Devils!

Features of this Manchester Devils Soccer game:
- Live the excitement of being part of the Manchester Devils football team and master the goal shooting!
- Play soccer like never before and become a legend of this passionate sport!
- Heard the crowd claiming your name as you progress through levels and tournaments!
- Unlock the items pack to boost your career in the Manchester Devils!
- Show off your football skills to prove you are made to score the best goal of your team!

Choose your character, face the goalkeeper, and progress across the different levels and game modes: goal shooting, penalties, free kicks, boxes... It is your chance to be the best player of the Manchester Devils soccer team. Are you ready to leave your print in the soccer history? Play now!
